text:
Spacelab - London - Full time software developer

Spacelab is a London based architecture, design and consultancy practice with a difference: we design buildings to fit people and our world-leading workplace consultancy service, developed in collaboration with UCL’s Bartlett School of Architecture is data-driven, intelligent and tailored to a client’s need to help them realise their business performance through space.​

We are looking for a highly motivated and independent software developer to join our Workplace Consultancy team on a full time permanent basis (with a salary range of £40-50k) to grow the technology component of our work.​

More info here http://spacelab.co.uk/the-laboratory/we-are-recruiting-a-sof...
